title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Michael Irvin on Dak, Cowboys Playoffs, Nick Wright on AB Dumpster Fire, NFL Week and Bama/Georgia CFP Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Michael Irvin on Dak, Cowboys Playoffs, Nick Wright on AB Dumpster Fire, NFL Week and Bama/Georgia CFP Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, it's top takes of the week, including his reaction to Antonio Brown's public sideline meltdown (3:00), the beef between Aaron Rodgers and a Chicago sportswriter (7:00), and the blowback over Kirk Herbstreit's controversial comments about college players skipping bowl games (9:00). Then, NFL Hall of Famer Michael Irvin discusses if Dak has proven he'll never be an elite QB (11:00), why he doesn't like people saying Dak was in a "slump" (13:00), and which team the Cowboys should be scared to face (15:00. First Things First co-host Nick Wright reacts to Antonio Brown's tantrum (24:00), and why it's unfair to compare AB to OBJ (29:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's a sharp or square with his week 18 Cowboys/Eagles, Niners/Rams Chargers/Raiders and the Bama/Georgia CFP Championship Game picks (33:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
